message: Is it just me or do these episodes feel so incredibly short? When the end credits started, I thought it was just the commercial bumper in the middle of the episode.

That's because Akagi is incredibly slow paced. It's still one of my all time favorites and I actually think that the slow pacing makes the mind games even better and more intense. Although I have to admit that the last arc could have really been a bit faster. It's still a great show haha
